title: [nosTEAM] Patches 1 to 12 for Arma III + Crack for 1.14.216248
description:
I AM NOT nosTEAM!!! I'm from the SNAKEPIT CREW! Still, in the end, I am just a regular user like you, ppl. :) 

SNAKEPIT HELPS YOU MAKE IT WORK AND HOSTS GAMES.
h t t p : // snakepitaltislife .servegame .com /  ( remove spaces)


This is simply a repackage of all ^^nosTEAM^^ patches for their Arma 3 release up until version 1.14.216248.


#################################################################
#                                                               #
# PLEASE NOTE:                                                  #
# these files are ment to work with their release found here:   #
#                                                               #
# http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8910655/Arma_3_PC_full_game_SP___MP_%28Tunngle%29___nosTEAM__          #
#                                                               #
# They WILL work with other releases but it's tricky.           #
#                                                               #
# 1) Check your game versions before patching.                  #
# 2) Follow PATCH INSTRUCTIONS at the bottom                    #
# 3) Check your cracked Steam dll files in your Arma3 folder.   #
#    That crack may cause server kick because of steam ticket.  #
# 4) Follow the CRACK INSTRUCTIONS at the bottom.               #
#################################################################

##################################################################################
#                                                                                #
# SIMPLE INSTRUCTIONS                                                            #
#                                                                                #
# 1 - Install Arma 3 from the torrent above. Read info there.                    #
# 2 - Patch the game using the files below in logical order.                     #
# 3 - Extract the crack to your Arma3 game folder.                               #
#     Read CRACK INSTRUCTIONS at the bottom.                                     #
# 4 - USE TUNNGLE to find LAN games.                                             #
#     Google & install it! Then, simply browse "arma III" there.                 #
# 5 - Launch Arma3, enter Multiplayer and select LAN GAMES when inside Tunngle.  #
# 6 - Enjoy.                                                                     #
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# 7 - ONLY IF YOUR GAME CRASHES OR FREEZES WHEN ENTERING THE MULTIPLAYER MENU    #
#                                                                                #
# You probably had another release on your machine. You have to clean your       #
# registry! You can use CCleaner or TuneUpUtilies or AdvancedSystemCare for that.#
# Also remember to tell your firewall the arma3.exe file has changed, since you  #
# updated the game. So allow any promts comming from your firewall/anti-virus.   #
# READ PATCH INSTRUCTIONS BELOW AND CRACK INSTRUCTIONS BELOW.                    #
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
##################################################################################

##################################################################################
#                                                                                #
# FILES INCLUDED: Patches + Crack                                                #
#                                                                                #
# PATCHES:                                                                       #
# ARMA3_patch-01_nosTEAM.exe -------------------> Ver. 1.2.110                   #
# ARMA3_patch-03_nosTEAM.exe -------------------> Ver. 1.4.111                   #
# ARMA3_patch-04_nosTEAM.exe -------------------> Ver. ...                       #
# ARMA3_patch-05_nosTEAM.exe -------------------> Ver. 1.6.112                   #
# ARMA3_patch-06-LANFIX_nosTEAM.exe ------------> Ver. 1.8.113                   #
# ARMA3_patch-07-LANFIX_nosTEAM.exe ------------> Ver. 1.10.114                  #
# ARMA3_patch-09_nosTEAM.exe -------------------> Ver. 1.12.115915               #
# ARMA3_patch-11_nosTEAM.exe -------------------> Ver. 1.14.116216               #
# ARMA3_patch-12_nosTEAM.exe -------------------> Ver. 1.14.116248               #
#                                                                                #
# It may seem there are some patches missing but there aren't.                   #
#                                                                                #
# - Patch 3 includes patches 2 and 3                                             #
# - Patch 9 includes patches 8 and 9                                             #
# - Patch 11 includes patches 10 and 11                                          #
#                                                                                #
# CRACK:                                                                         #
# ARMA 3 V1.14.116248 MP fix.zip (includes exe + steam crack dll files)          #
# ----------------------------------------                                       #
# arma3.exe (version 1.14.116248)    |EXE|                                       #
# -----------------------------------------------------------------              #
# Steam.dll                                                       |              #
# steamclient.dll                                                 |              #
# ValveAPI.dll                                                    |-----         #
# steam_api.dll                                                   |STEAM|        #
# Steam2WrapperLaucher.exe (may trigger anti-virus but it's safe) |CRACK|        #
# LumaEmu.ini                                                     |-----         #
# steam_appid.txt                                                 |              #
# Filter.txt                                                      |              #
# -----------------------------------------------------------------              #
#                                                                                #
##################################################################################

##################################################################################
#                                                                                #
#PATCH INSTRUCTIONS:                                                             #
#                                                                                #
# If you're using another release like 3DM or RELOADED remember                  #
#                                                                                #
#### USE AT YOUR OWN RISK ####                                                   #
#                                                                                #
# I'm sure the patches will update other releases like 3DM as long as you know   #
# what you are doing. It will work even if you have applied an FTS patch before. #
#                                                                                #
# 1 - CHECK YOUR GAME VERSION in the main menu, on the bottom right corner.      #
# 2 - Patch from that version onward.                                            #
#                                                                                #
# From what i've seen, patch numbers coincide so FTS patch number are the same as#
# nosTEAM patch numbers. And if you do something wrong the nosTEAM patches will  #
# inform you the file versions don't match to what they expect them to be, and   #
# will #halt the patch.                                                          #
#                                                                                #
# It is MANDATORY to clean your registry in this situation.                      #
#                                                                                #
#### So remember to USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!!! ####                                 #
##################################################################################

##################################################################################
#                                                                                #
# CRACK INSTRUCTIONS:                                                            #
#                                                                                #
# A) EXE                                                                         #
#                                                                                #
# 1 - The NOSTEAM patches already crack the EXE, so you won't need it.           #
# 2 - However, if you have the Multiplayer crash/freeze issue it's advisable to  #
#     use the crack's EXE and clean your registry as explained in the PATCH      #
#     INSTRUCTIONS.                                                              #
#                                                                                #
# B) STEAM CRACK (this is where it all changes from crack to crack)              #
#                                                                                #
# 1 - Those files cause servers to kick you due to invalid steam ticket.         #
# 2 - Use the ones here to play in most TUNNGLE servers.                         #
#                                                                                #
##################################################################################
